thread.title: Cablevision Reaches New Content Agreement With CBS
thread.title_full: Cablevision Reaches New Content Agreement With CBS - WSJ

author: Angela Chen
title: Cablevision Reaches New Content Agreement With CBS
text:
Cablevision Systems Corp. and CBS Corp. have reached a new content agreement that covers retransmission consent for CBS-owned stations.
Financial terms of the multiyear agreement werenâ€™t disclosed.
Cablevision will continue to carry Showtime, CBS Sports Network and Smithsonian Channel. It will also distribute CBS All Access and Showtime... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
